review: The fire tv would be great if all i wanted to do was stream movies. But if you bought it with gaming in mind beware, IT SUCKS.I bought the game controller along with the fire tv and was initially impressed. The graphics far surpassed my expectations, good selection of free games (event the games that cost money are inexpensive) it seemed like a really great alternative to spending the big bucks on a game console and having to buy ridiculously overpriced games. So what sucks about it you ask??? Having so little memory is a real pain. That is where amazon dropped the ball. You only have room for 2 or 3 games at a time. So if you want to buy a new game you have to delete something and lose your progress, just to free up some space.COME ON AMAZON I'm waiting for this one flaw to be fixed and then i will sing it's praises as the coolest, most affordable, fun game systemaround
